data.text: @StephanieRade18 When he took oversight away on those funds that was the sign it wasn’t going to go well. Manuchin is a criminal as well.

@BobNYC59 It was totally sickening and not surprising at all. Years ago I investigated white collar crimes, all these billionaires and millionaires are connected globally. It would make your head spin. 45, filthy with criminality
@StephanieRade18 Stephanie as details have come out over time and you know better than I do it was obvious who benefited the most tragically 👍👊
@BobNYC59 I’m a researcher, Bob. I research extremists and terrorists, but in the past money. The minute they started releasing the figures I started digging 😊
@BobNYC59 I’m immune compromised like millions of people. We are just left behind
@StephanieRade18 My mayor is s fraud of a democrat.
@StephanieRade18 All facts. I didn’t take care of myself to go out and get sick to make politicians happy.

@BobNYC59 US could have done what the Europeans did. Give subsidies to restaurants and bars, so they could close but pay their rent and staff. They chose not to. Most of the Covid-19 funding went to millionaires, billionaires and crooks, not to medium and small businesses
@BobNYC59 Government has bent to anti vaxxers, anti vaxxers and the billionaires. I said this to my medical provider Mom, she said, Steph, you’re right. 5 day quarantine was the first step
